p: Quantitative data were expressed in mean Â± standard deviation. Inter-group and intra-group comparison of quantitative data were performed by independent sample t-test and matched t-test, respectively. Mann-Whitney rank sum test and Chi-square test were used for the inter-group comparison of ordered and disordered qualitative data, respectively. Statistical analysis was done by SPSS 19.0 software, and a significant difference was defined as P < 0.05.
